column4: So - I'm trying to get M4A / AAC / MP4 (not encrypted - standard ones) support working with gstreamer / rhythmbox.  I have all the gst plugins installed, but it still doesn't work.
anybody know how to do AAC / MP4's under ubuntu?  I can't figure out what gstreamer plugin / whatever I am missing.
i dont know how gstreamer does it, but if you install totem-xine and the w32codecs, you will get it working, i think atleast it did for me.
thanks - I was trying to do it with the gstreamer support, but I may not be able to
